bibl.title: Egypt and Beyond. Essays Presented to Leonard H. Lesko upon his Retirement from the Wilbour Chair of Egyptology at Brown University, June 2005.
bibl.seg: Thompson Stephen E. and Peter Der Manuelian (Edd.), Egypt and Beyond. Essays Presented to Leonard H. Lesko upon his Retirement from the Wilbour Chair of Egyptology at Brown University, June 2005.
Providence, RI, Brown University, Department of Egyptology and Ancient Western Asian Studies, 2008. ISBN 978-0-9802065-0-0.
